arts.sum: Highlights of the Sky Bet Championship match between Sunderland and Stoke.

arts.ttl: Stoke player ratings vs Sunderland as Potters pay price for frustrating lapse
arts.sum: A long ball found Watson about 15 yards outside the Stoke box and he played a one-two with Jobe Bellingham before stepping forward without being challenged, seeming to surprise Viktor Johansson with a shot that sped up as it bounced low inside the near post. Stoke took the lead when Million Manhoef dropped deep and zipped a through ball for Koumas to beat a high Sunderland defensive line and sprint towards the area from the half-way line, coming in from the right.

arts.ttl: Local teen Watson nets twice to steer Sunderland past Stoke
arts.sum: Teenager Tom Watson scored his first Sunderland goals as the Black Cats came from behind to beat Stoke 2-1 at the Stadium of Light.

arts.ttl: Tom Watson scores late winner as Sunderland come from behind to beat Stoke
arts.sum: Lewis Koumas had put the visitors in front.

arts.ttl: Sunderland vs Stoke City live news, action and reaction from Stadium of Light
arts.sum: Then we saw against the top teams like Sheffield United away or Burnley the other day at home or Southampton in the cup, we played 5-4-1 but you always saw a good shape, well organised and players defending with commitment. "I think that the team tactically is organised.

arts.ttl: Mikel Arteta reveals true feelings on Tony Pulis comments as Arsenal dubbed 'the new Stoke'
arts.sum: Former Tottenham and Manchester United forward Dimitar Berbatov compared Arsenal to Stoke City after they scored twice from corners against the Red Devils

arts.ttl: Mikel Arteta lifts lid on Stoke City comparisons
arts.sum: Mikel Arteta has said it is a “big compliment” to be compared to Tony Pulis’ Stoke City side and said Arsenal want to be the “kings of everything” as he moved to defend the club’s set-piece record. Arsenal’s set-piece guru Nicolas Jover, who Arteta first took to Manchester City and then with him to Arsenal, has been the figurehead behind the club’s dead-ball success.

arts.ttl: Mikel Arteta responds to Dimitar Berbatov comparing Arsenal to Stoke
arts.sum: Mikel Arteta responds to comparisons between his Arsenal side and Stoke City.

arts.ttl: Mikel Arteta insists Arsenal take Dimitar Berbatov's Stoke City comparisons as a 'compliment' as he says his team want to be 'the kings of everything' and not just corners
arts.sum: Mikel Arteta insisted he is flattered by comparisons to Stoke City over Arsenal's set-piece prowess - and is aiming to dominate across all areas of the game.

arts.ttl: Cirkin returns: Sunderland team news and predicted XI to face Stoke City
arts.sum: The latest Sunderland team news as Regis Le Bris' side gear up to face Stoke City in the Championship. The post Cirkin returns: Sunderland team news and predicted XI to face Stoke City appeared first on The72 - Football League News.
